ith "data model" and I think you've got it.
This style bends over backwards=
 to be declarative, which limits the
"processing model" to two things: pars=
ing and state transitions, both of

elf. Any higher layers of
processing are unconstrained, and a human with a =
browser can process a
response wildly differently than a spider, or even di=
fferently than
other humans. This is the essence of re-use, and is baked in=
